I was noticing there are very few biographies of the major Japanese 
(medieval) historical characters in English.

Can you confirm???

I have found:

Hideyoshi (1983, Berry; an older one by Dening, 1888)
Nobunaga (2001, printed in Holland, limited)
Ieyasu (1937, Sadler)
Ashikaga Yoshimasa (2003, Keene)
Ashikaga Yoshimitsu (never published, as far as I know)
Taira no Kiyomori 							( " )
Takeda Shingen 					( " )
...
There was one on Yoritomo, but I can't remember...

can you confirm the above? Do you know of any other...?
thanks!

cepo
